Interview With Monty Widenius

07 Oct 2002

Codewalkers.com is hosting an interview with Monty Widenius. Monty is the designer and lead programmer of the MySQL database. Questions will be accepted until October 22, 2002. At that time, the top rated questions will be sent off to Monty for answers. You can submit your questions here.
